name: Portal Pusher (Krayne)
description:
Play keep away with the evil simple shapes with your trusty portal gun (property of Aperture Labs TM). However, Oh No!, it only shoots out blue portals while the orange portal has a mind of its own. Stay alive for as long as you can as more and more enemies chase you down.

Remake of an old Game Jam project made for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.1 Theme - Holes.
